fixes.name: Posgrado en Curso
fixes.dax_expression:
CALCULATE(
    DISTINCTCOUNT('TABLA FINAL_ Encuesta_Transpues (Varias conexiones)'[Número de cédula:]),
    'TABLA FINAL_ Encuesta_Transpues (Varias conexiones)'[Posgrado en curso] = "Sí"
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Translated the FIXED LOD + COUNTD(IF ...) into a measure that counts distinct Número de cédula: where Posgrado en curso = "Sí". COUNTD -> DISTINCTCOUNT and the fixed scope is implemented by filtering the table in CALCULATE.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The Tableau expression uses a FIXED LOD ({ FIXED ... }), which is an aggregation/context-based calculation and must be implemented as a measure in Power BI.
